# Lunar Cycles of Faith
## Scripture
"And God said, 'Let there be lights in the vault of the sky to separate the day from the night, and let them serve as signs to mark sacred times, and days and years.'" - Genesis 1:14

## Reflection
As we observe the phases of the moon, we're reminded of the ebbs and flows of our faith journey. Just as the moon waxes and wanes, our trust in God can grow and diminish. Yet, even in the darkest phases, the moon remains, a constant presence in the night sky. Similarly, God's presence in our lives remains unwavering, even when our faith is weak. The lunar cycles serve as a reminder to trust in God's sovereignty and timing. Just as the moon will always return to fullness, our faith can be restored and renewed through prayer, scripture, and community.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, thank you for the celestial reminders of your presence in our lives. Help us to trust in your sovereignty, even in the darkest phases of our faith journey. May we find comfort in the constancy of your love and the promise of renewal and restoration. As we gaze up at the night sky, may our hearts be filled with wonder, awe, and a deepening trust in your goodness. Amen.
